However, when the above substitutions (S37P, G48L, Q58E, I84V or 240 L89I) were introduced in the WT sequence they showed parallel replication capacities 241 to those observed with a MAX background. We can speculate that the introduced 242 synonymous substitutions affected neighboring residues (e.g., RNA structure).

However, it must be noted that the MAX and WT proteases have similar RNA folding 244 free energy (10).
